ygData.subject: Re: My experience getting Tinkering to 75 ...
ygData.msgSnippet: Very off subject, but does anyone know of a good site that tells all about tailoring? I already know how to make the general leather, studded, and reinforced
ygData.messageBody:
Very off subject, but does anyone know of a good site that tells all about
tailoring?
I already know how to make the general leather, studded, and reinforced
armor. And also the formula to make the backpacks.
But what about the quivers? What about the latest news of tailoring as to
the latest patch.
There must be a good site out there for this, yet it has evaded me.
If you do know of a good site please tell me.
I apologize for posting this here, but I didn't really know where else to
ask for help.
----- Original Message -----
From: <Clanof1@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, September 15, 1999 3:40 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] My experience getting Tinkering to 75 ...


> From: Clanof1@...
>
> um, you cant make the spyglass anyways, how would yo know if its trivial?
> dont you need that fishing pole. if not id like the magic formula
>
